# VEHICLE::SET_CARGOBOB_EXTA_PICKUP_RANGE

## Summary
Sets an amount the cargobob pickup range is increased by. This makes it easier to pick up vehicles

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **FLOAT** rangeIncrease
